AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the CRPS engine configuration

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the CRPS engine scan (eviction) configuration

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table initiate and enable the engine activity

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ITM_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for CGM source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ITTP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ITPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ERPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ERPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ETPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ETPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_CRPS_IRPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for IRPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_TYPE_OFFSET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the Object-Type-Offset of the engine. offset per type

AppDB.Name: CRPS_EXPANSION_DATA_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the expansion mapping per engine
